body.p: Many respondents to the 2010 Hedge Accounting Exposure Draft asked the IASB to provide further guidance on the notion of ‘other than accidental offsetting’. Many also suggested that the IASB revise the proposed guidance by introducing a direct reference to the aspect of an economic relationship between the hedged item and the hedging instrument that was included in the application guidance proposed in the 2010 Hedge Accounting Exposure Draft.
